Name: Two Move Chess
About the game: Chess, but White moves twice, and then Black moves once, and White moves twice, and so forth. Your goal is to either checkmate or take the enemy king. Feel how strong the White pieces are, and break through Black's defense with White. Or choose Black, and defend against the Mighty White King! This game is not pvp. You play against an engine.
